name: ARPB_RSH_CHGREV_QLFY_HX
description: This table holds all of the research billing review timestamps and times that the charge qualified for research billing review.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the professional billing transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RSH_REV_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant research charge review was performed.

columns.name: RSH_REV_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user who performed research charge review.

columns.name: RSH_REV_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: REV_RESEARCH_ID
columns.description: This item stores the study for which the charge was marked as reviewed.

columns.name: RSH_REV_NOTE_ID
columns.description: This item stores a research charge review comment.

columns.name: RSH_REV_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores a research charge review user type.

columns.name: RSH_REV_EXPIRE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant research charge review expired and re-review is needed in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

columns.name: RSH_REV_QLFY_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant research charge review is needed in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
